basic.floral_language:
Cymbidium ensifolium
Floriography: virtuous, tender, intelligent
Cymbidium ensifolium, commonly referred to as the Chinese orchid, represents simplicity and serenity.
Cymbidium ensifolium are graceful with slender leaves and colorful, exotic flowers with pure colors and fragrances, though not as huge as the orchids flowers in the West, but very elegant. For its high ornamental value, often used to decorate rooms.
Cymbidium ensifolium like half shaded environments. Flowering time differs in different varieties throughout the year with a month-long flowering time, promptly cut the scape after flowering for germination in the next year.
basic.blooming: Flowering period June-October, viewing period 3-4 weeks
basic.color: Light yellow green with purple marks

maintenance.soil: Breathable and loose planting materials with coconut shell, bark or sphagnum moss
maintenance.sunlight: Like more sunlight among Chinese orchids, resistant to half shadereceive more light when leaves are dark green
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry, may spray to the ambient environment in summer, reduce watering in winter
maintenance.fertilization: Apply fertilizers every 10-15 days in the growing seasons of spring and autumn, foliar fertilizer spray also do good for its growth , fertilize under 10 ℃ (50 ℉) is forbidden
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased and dead leaves timely, remove peduncle after flowering
